features: Universal Size Reduces Trouble：304 stainless steel bidet sprayer for toilet will fit for most toilets in America. You just need to make sure the sizes of your toilet tank and water supply line are 7/8"(about 0.8") before purchase. Come with all the parts for installation, no need to buy any tool. The hand sprayer bidet will improve personal hygiene, especially for women pregnancy and menstrual cycles.

Two Mount Options Lets You Choose：Toilet tank mounted-clamp the holder to the edge of the toilet tank cover, saving the bathromm space and no need to drill hole. Wall mounted-use screws with anchors to fix the holder without hook to the wall, meeting different needs but need to drill hole. Bidets for existing toilets allow you to easily clean sensitive parts every time you use the bathroom.

Perfect Match Requires No Tool：We specially designed the T valve as a plastic nut, which is more matched with the plastic toilet tank connetor than the metal nut. If your toilet tank connector is also plastic, Vitbirih handheld bidet sprayer for toilet is your best choice. You can easily tighten it by hand without using a wrench.

Anti-burst Hose Avoids Leaking: The upgraded hose for toilet sprayer has dual protection, high quality 304 stainless steel shell and the inner tube is made of quality braid, which can effectively prevent the hose from bursting to make the hose more durable and last longer. You can get more moeny for value with Vitbirih jet spray for toilet.

Adjustable Water Pressure Meets Multi-purpose: Pressing the different strength of the toilet bidet sprayer handle to control the water pressure from gentle spraye to jet spray. Gentle press mode for feminine bottom cleaning, baby bath or pet bath washing. Jet spray for rinsing floor, carpets or baby cloth diapers.TOPSUNCOJIAS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Coming from Thailand, where every toilet is equipped with one of these. Genius! Why do Americans still use toilet paper?? This is an excellent product, super easy to install without tools. Every toilet in your home should have one of thee!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: the pressure change is very convenient, easy install and no rust with durable metal, will definitely buy more for all my bathrooms

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Remember, it connects to COLD water
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to fill the tank as a workaround until I can afford to get a plumber to fix my toilet. I have not used it for the intended purpose, but one thing that occured to me as my hand was freezing filling the tank... It connects to the cold water supply. COLD WATER. Just keep that in mind if you are looking at any of these sprayers.It is definitely powerful and you can control the pressure. It was very easy to install. But I would not want to use it on my privates because it is too cold!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Every one needs this!
reviews.reviewText: As a Southeast Asian person, this is absolutely essential to have in my bathroom! However, I've also gotten some of my non-Asian friends into this too and they love it! It is easy to install and isn't expensive like a bidet. Aside from being more expensive, I find bidets to be finicky when adjusting the water and its pressure, but this product eliminates that problem. This hose allows you to have full control of where you want to spray and the water pressure you prefer. Oh, and a bit of a pro tip: if you prefer warm or hot water instead of cold, you can attach the hose to your sink instead. I personally don't do this since my toilet is not next to my sink, but my parents have it installed like this and it works just as well. I also like that it has a handle that hang on your toilet tank for easy storage and convenience. I think every one needs to have one of these in every toilet and there's honestly no excuse with how easy to install and inexpensive this is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with the quality and craftsmanship of this handheld bidet sprayer. It’s easy to install and has a nice appealing style, which goes with the rest of my bathroom’s hardware and decor. The T valve is made of metal material, not plastic, which I find very important. No leaks. The pressure is a bit strong, but you can easily control it by applying light pressure to the sprayer. It is a very convenient hygienic tool for those absolute moments, especially for women!! Make sure to turn the valve to off position and spray any remaining water that’s in the hose after each use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with the purchase, it works as expected.
reviews.reviewText: Happy with the purchase, it works as expected. Initially, the t valve was leaking but we realized that it wasn’t completely tight. After tightening it, the spray works amazing. Made with amazing quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great But Has Issues
reviews.reviewText: So we recently tried this bidet. It has many great things. The setup is so easy that even a kindergarten kid can install it. Great job by the engineers. Now second, the pressure is perfect too. The only problem we are facing is after 4-5 seconds of usage, it back fires water from the handle. This is something that the company should rectify. That leakage does feel disgusting though its just normal water but happening at a wrong time.Update: A new issue has come up. The leakage is now happening from the nozzle.I think if this is manufacturing defect, I suggest don't buy this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product works great so far. The plastic connector on T valve works better than the metal ones. It was easy to install and no water leaks so far.
Bidet sprayer for toilet works perfect, good quality product, easy installation and easy to use. I will recommend this product.
The product doesn't fit Aussie brand of toilet (Caroma). Caroma toilet hose and things are very small.Other than that, it looked okay and had everything needed for the job.
